title: Vaishnavi Kundan Kangan - Royal Polki Diamond Bangle
features: This exquisite bangle showcases a classic Kundan setting with meticulously placed Polki diamonds. The design incorporates square and circular motifs, creating a captivating geometric pattern. Intricate filigree work and detailed gold settings enhance the overall regal appeal. The flexible design ensures a comfortable fit. The bangle features a detailed lattice pattern on the reverse, showcasing attention to detail.
description: This Kundan Vanki is a timeless heirloom piece, blending traditional craftsmanship with modern elegance. The Polki diamonds provide a unique, unmatched brilliance. The flexible design guarantees comfortable and secure wear. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring lasting beauty. Perfect for brides seeking a statement piece or anyone looking to add a touch of royalty to their ensemble.
